FuncDef: The display port-security command displays security information of interfaces. The display port-security command displays security information of interfaces. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K and CE6820S.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the type and number of an interface.
-
